name: Madness Insurgency
description:
*Initially made for madness day 2021 but soon realized only art/music/animation is accepted((*

*This game might be updated in the future but it's not 100% true*

--------------CONTROLS-----------------------

W,A,S,D - Movement

LMB - Attack

RMB - Gun Pickup/ Dispose

P - Pause

K - Suicide/Stage Reset

-----------------------------------------------------

And yes, It uses the same engine as my previous game with slight alterations heavily inspired by HLM))

--------------CREDITS---------------------------
